rules_text:
Flying, Trample
Whenever a creature you control attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it if it has flying, put another +1/+1 counter on it if it has trample, and so on for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, vigilance, and haste.
notes:

OG_1:
